An amazing continuation of the original Portal game. A stunning game packed with even more humour and action. The whole journey through the history of Aperture tells its own story, however it still makes by far the most sense if you played the original game. Portal 2 is absolutely worth it, especially if you buy it during a Steam Sale for a greatly reduced price.

Great game. Valve legit struck the nail in for this in every way possible. I feel like one of the main things that makes it such a good game is the soundtrack and such, I absolutely love how interactive the music is as you progress in a chamber; It just adds such a nice layer of quality for the game being.
